name: Flare Tale
description:
Thank you for passsing by.

(Better Played on Desktop)

Created by: Ana Luisa  Flores Guzman & Rodolfo León Gasca..

For this game Jam the team dicided to make a puzzle - plataformer

In "Flare Tale" you will help our little friend return to its home. As you discover this unknown landscape, you'll have to overcome the obstacles presented on Flare's Tale.

Controls: 

Move with (wasd,).
Jump (w, space).

Restart(r)

Drag Blocks (mouse left hold).

Reset Hold (mouse right click)

notes:
Blocks deselect if you pressed right click or put the cursor away from the block.
Better played on desktop this game can slow down if played with bad internet connection resulting in a low fram rate.

Art: @annalou_iza  https://www.instagram.com/annalou_iza/

Programing: FoundTexas 

Music: https://www.bensound.com
